{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot | youtube.com/GamerRobot","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1676329,"totalDownVotes":108070,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[🔥 🔵 UPDATE] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":182907,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥 🔵 UPDATE 17 Part 2 OUT NOW 
New awakening, new island, new boss raid, new weapon, and LOTS MORE! 

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2300
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Soul, and Dragon.

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2562858,"totalDownVotes":184675,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"[🥚 EVENT!] Pet Simulator X! 🐾","placeId":6284583030,"playerCount":113459,"imageToken":"T_6284583030_936f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💰 Earn coins!

🧡 Made with love by Preston","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1136742,"totalDownVotes":225300,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars ⏰ [NEW GAME COUNTDOWN!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":70379,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥🔥 Updates every Friday at 3:00pm PST, 6:00pm EST 🔥🔥

How to play BedWars:

🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the game!

✨ Play custom modes like SkyWars and Lucky Block!

Cr Some Clothing: Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":834104,"totalDownVotes":58851,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[UPD 25 + 🐰] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":40597,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!

- Bug fixes + balance changes + improvements ","genre":""},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2850451,"totalDownVotes":437922,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":206235,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay. Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":13632331,"creatorName":"A_TEAM_","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":160557,"totalDownVotes":8698,"universeId":3405618667,"name":"[RELEASED!] Sonic Speed Simulator","placeId":9049840490,"playerCount":36645,"imageToken":"T_9049840490_a6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌟FREE TO PLAY LAUNCH!🌟 WEEKLY UPDATES PLANNED

Thanks for playing and we can't wait to hear what you think!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1005883,"totalDownVotes":82727,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[⭐PASS!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":30975,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

🔨More updates upcoming!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":5084967,"totalDownVotes":441546,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":33387,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 
Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":343503,"totalDownVotes":63153,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ENEL&STUFF] ABA","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":14852,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"ANIME BATTLE ARENA

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/1226491/RW","genre":""},{"creatorId":4546767,"creatorName":"Pressure Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":346139,"totalDownVotes":18088,"universeId":2937673012,"name":"[UPD] ⚡Clicker Simulator!","placeId":7560156054,"playerCount":26284,"imageToken":"T_7560156054_e0eb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEW CODE AT 350K LIKES! FOLLOW & FAVORITE to be notified!","genre":""},{"creatorId":10885371,"creatorName":"i_studioman","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":10621,"totalDownVotes":1066,"universeId":3258251641,"name":"Stand Upright: Rebooted","placeId":8540168650,"playerCount":16840,"imageToken":"T_8540168650_2515","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Bugs are not very present, lets go!!1 (If you do find a bug please report it in our community server.)

RELEASE!!!!!!!!!

In-game commands currently:
/check [playername]
/trade [playername]
/handitem [playername]
/dropitem
/mount (only works if you own a mount.)
/unmount

Game gets frequent updates.
Shutdown = Update

Head Developer/Scripter: i_stabman
Animator(s): admpn
Modeler(s): Legend_Cario, slime868111
Contributors: THANOSMELLBAD (Inner Sanctum Building), FredDey_Z (Artwork)
You need to buy the game passes from Original Stand Upright to use them here.
Original SU to buy gamepasses from: https://www.roblox.com/games/4519240880/Stand-Upright-testing
(Note, this process is automatic, meaning that once you buy a gamepass from SU, you will immediately have it in SU:R.)

If you notice that your assets may be in SU:R and you want them removed, feel free to contact us.

This remake was mostly inspired by Stand Upright in around July 2020.","genre":""},{"creatorId":12420072,"creatorName":"Lightning Dragon Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":194523,"totalDownVotes":11690,"universeId":3262314006,"name":"[🐰+2x⚔️☯] Weapon Fighting Simulator","placeId":8554378337,"playerCount":24289,"imageToken":"T_8554378337_148f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🥋 Welcome to Weapon Fighting Simulator 🥋
WFS is a simulator game where you fight against enemies with weapons, spells and become the strongest martial fighter of all times!

🗡️ - Unlock new and powerful weapons!
🧙‍♂️ - Unlock new spells to aid you in battle!
🗺️ - Discover new worlds with different enemies and BOSS!

🎡 Roblox Premium members get x2 Wheel Rewards

🔥 UPDATE [12]:
- New Spiritual Defense Mode on Banshee Snowfields
- Added a community art panel on the Martial World
- Added the ability to claim Thunder Bolt again
+ MORE, CHECK OUT NOW!

🌐 - Join the Lightning Dragon Studios group for a free "Fan" Nametag above your name!
👍 -  Thumbs up and favorite for more updates!

🚀 RELEASE CODES: weaponfighting, welcome, goodluck, happyday
🥚 EASTER CODE: easter
🐞 EXTRA CODE: compensation
🎁 NEW UPDATE CODE: defense
👍 180K LIKES CODE(Pay attention to case): likes180k
💖 NEW CODE AT 200K LIKES.","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":700150,"totalDownVotes":314248,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":20743,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3868247,"totalDownVotes":480162,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":13437,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Lock and Load with the exclusive Virtual Nomad Bundle through Prime Gaming and unlock six unique functionalities: Character Skin, Custom Emote, Weapon Skin, Elimination Effect, Melee Weapon, and Calling Card

1) Log in to your account on roblox.com
2) Go to roblox.com/redeem and enter your code.
3) Your item can be equipped from within the Avatar Editor. Enjoy!

After you redeem the offer on roblox.com/redeem, launch Arsenal on Roblox, open the Prime Gaming pop-up, and select “Redeem Item” to receive the bonus rewards. Then, go into your Locker to equip th

Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":940736,"totalDownVotes":61962,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"[UPDATE 🦆] Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":16633,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. Team up with friends to fend off countless waves of zombies, fight bosses, earn coins, level up, and buy new towers! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494

🔧 Engineer Tower (!)
🦆 Duck Hunt Gamemode
🐤 Duck Hunt Season

🚜 Farm Lobby
😀 New Faces

🏆 8th Annual Bloxy Award Winner","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1594629,"totalDownVotes":88062,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":14260,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🧸 Bee Swarm Simulator toys are available now at Walmart Supercenters! Collect toy bees and hive slots to construct a real hive! There are also adorable plushies, bear action figures, and more! 🎉

Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for Honey, Treats and codes! https://www.roblox.com/groups/3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2666940,"totalDownVotes":344513,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":22171,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4055350,"totalDownVotes":442893,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":23520,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg.
